lead_paragraph: The All-Star center Vincent Lecavalier signed an 11-year, $85 million contract extension with the Tampa Bay Lightning. Lecavalier, a 28-year old forward scored an N.H.L.-leading 52 goals during the 2006-7 season. He had 40 goals last season.
